dialogue.introduction: My name is Samidare! I look forward to working with you. Please leave any escort missions to me!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Samidare. My friends Murasame, Yuudachi and Harusame, we made up DesDiv2. Oh yeah, during a transport mission, I crashed into Shiratsuyu... Really, I'm... sorry for being clumsy... But, I'll do my best!
dialogue.secretary2: Admiral, I'll do my very best!
dialogue.secretaryidle: When it is night, from time to time, I think back of something. Something about apologizing to Hiei-san. But, I co~uldn't remember clearly... What was it I wonder~? ...Just a bit more...
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, I...the Admiral...I li...NOTHING! I'll do my best from now on too!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: At last it's finally our turn.
dialogue.equipment2: I'm so happy, I will show you the new me.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Fu... I'll take a small rest.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I can't anymore... I will take a small nap then...
dialogue.docking_complete: Admiral, the repair is complete as well.
dialogue.ship_construction: Ah..., A new ally? I want to meet her soon.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The operation has completed, thank you for your work.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: I won't let anyone call me clumsy anymore!
dialogue.night_battle: It's not over yet, it starts from here!
dialogue.night_attack: Please leave the front lines to me.
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Please leave the front lines to me.
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Please leave the front lines to me.
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Please leave the front lines to me.
dialogue.mvp: I did it! Admiral, did you see that?
dialogue.sunk: I'm sorry... it seems that this is as far as I can go...
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, today is an anniversary right? It's amazing! Samidare will try harder than usual!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Samidare is quite fond of it, the rainy season. It feels like, how to put it... the rain's just so good, isn't it? Right? â™ª
dialogue.midsummer_2015: It's summer, summer! Admiral, let's go to the sea together! ...Ah-, we do go there everyday, don't we.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, Merry Christmas! Samidare has brought the cake-*screams while losing balance and assumingly tripping*
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year! Admiral, this year too, leave it to Samidare! Yes!
